    Description
    Board
    Represents the game board that holds placed cards and manages available and closed spots, as well as symbol counters.

    the EmptyDeckException shows that there aren't any cards left

    PlacedCard
    Represents a card that has been placed on the board at a specific position.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game, holding the player's state and behaviors.
    PlayerSetup
    Represents the setup configuration for a player, including their starter card, goals, hand of cards, and chosen color.
